name: Boris, Doom's Caretaker
effect:
When Boris comes into play, draw a card.
"If Doom has a conscience, Boris keeps it safe."

name: Cryonic Grenade
effect:
As an additional cost to play Cryonic Grenade, exhaust a character you control.

Target opponent loses 3 endurance.
"These grenades were one of Doom's first inventions."

  • Collector Number: MFF-024
  • Rarity: U
  • Card Type: Plot Twist
  • Attack Value (ATK): 0
  • Defense Value (DEF): 0
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 2
  • Artist: Steve Rude

Target opponent loses 3 endurance.
"These grenades were one of Doom's first inventions."

name: Crystal, Elemental Princess
effect:
Support row characters you control get +1 DEF.
"After Franklin was born, Crystal helped out watchin' him and takin' Suzie's place on the team."

name: Darkoth, Death Demon
effect:
Darkoth gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF while exhausted.
"Doom turned one of my best friends into a brainwashed, bloodthirsty monster out to kill me. He's gonna pay for that."

name: Doom's Laboratory
effect:
Activate >>> Target Doom character you control gets +1 ATK this attack.
"I gotta wonder if all Doom ever does is sit around and think up ways to kill us."

name: Dr. Doom, Scientific Sorcerer
effect:
Exhaust a character you control >>> Dr. Doom gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.
"He blames Reed for ruinin' his face. If I ever get my hands on him, I'll show him what a ruined face really looks like."

name: Dragon Man, Experimental Monster
effect:
Whenever Dragon Man attacks a Fantastic Four character, Dragon Man gets +3 ATK this attack.
"Fightin’ Doom has taught me a thing or two about clobberin’ the horrors he cooks up in his lab."

name: Flying Kick
effect:
Target character you control has flight this turn.

While attacking this turn, that character gets +3 ATK.

  • Collector Number: MFF-025
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Plot Twist
  • Attack Value (ATK): 0
  • Defense Value (DEF): 0
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 1
  • Artist: Brandon Peterson
While attacking this turn, that character gets +3 ATK.

name: Force Shield
effect:
Target Fantastic Four character you control has reinforcement while defending this turn.
"They can shoot their lasers all day . . . nothin's gonna get through one of Suzie's shields."

name: H.E.R.B.I.E., Humanoid Experimental Robot B-Type Integrated Electronics
effect:
When H.E.R.B.I.E. comes into play, reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed a Fantastic Four character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
"The little guy helps out Stretch in his lab."

name: Human Torch, Hothead
effect:
Whenever Human Torch attacks or defends, target opponent loses 2 endurance.
"He takes chances and he's a pain in the keister, but he’s the closest thing to a little brother a lunk like me ever had."

name: Invisible Woman, Protector
effect:
Invisible Woman has reinforcement while defending.
"Reed might lead the team, but Suzie's what holds it together."

name: Kristoff Von Doom, Ticking Time Bomb
effect: "The most rotten, despicable thing that creep's ever done was hypnotizing this kid into thinking he was Doom."

name: Luke Cage, Reserve Member
effect:
When Luke Cage comes into play, draw a card.
"I needed a vacation, but the team needed a hero. And well, Luke Cage was for hire . . . "

name: Medusa, Medusalith Amaquelin
effect:
Whenever a character attacks Medusa, that character cannot ready this turn.
"She's a bad girl gone good, even fillin' in for Suzie every once in a while."

name: Mr. Fantastic, Leader
effect:
Other Fantastic Four characters you control get +1 ATK and +1 DEF.
"'Smart' don't have enough letters to say how smart he is."

name: No Fear
effect: Choose one: Target attacker gets +3 ATK this attack while attacking a character with a higher cost; or target defender gets +3 ATK this attack while defending against a character with a higher cost.

name: Noah Baxter, CEO, Baxter Industries
effect: "Reed rented out the top of the Baxter Building from an old family friend."

name: One-Two Punch
effect:
Target attacker gets +1 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.
"Me and Luke got more in common than super hard skin . . . we both like clobberin' knuckleheads."

name: Ovoid Mentor, Alien Mentalist
effect:
Exhaust a character you control >>> Ovoid Mentor gets +1 ATK this attack.
"This alien taught Doom a nasty mind-swapping trick. Like he needed another way to be underhanded."

name: Personal Nemesis
effect:
Target character you control gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.
"Reed didn't start this feud, but he'll be the one to finish it."

name: Reed's Workshop
effect:
Activate >>> Target Fantastic Four defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack.
"How he finds anything in there, I'll never know."

name: She-Hulk, Green Jeans
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, She-Hulk gets +1 ATK this turn for each front row character target opponent controls.
"I got lost in space, so Reed asked Jennifer to take my place for a while."

name: Sub-Mariner, Atlantean Monarch
effect:
When Sub-Mariner comes into play, if you have the initiative, you may exhaust target character an opponent controls.
"Whenever this guy shows up, we never know if he's gonna be a friend or foe."

name: Thing, Strongman
effect: "And then there’s me: the ever-lovin’ blue-eyed Thing."

name: Titania, Big Bad Bully
effect:
Titania gets +1 ATK for each character in your front row.
"She tried to kill She-Hulk once. Heck, she's tried to kill everybody once."

name: Victor Von Doom II, Doomed Heir
effect:
When Victor Von Doom II comes into play, search your deck for a character card named Dr. Doom. Reveal that card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"Doom cloned himself an heir, but the creation ended up turning against him."

name: Volcana, Raging Inferno
effect:
Activate >>> Target player loses 3 endurance.
"Doom gave her all those powers when we were fightin' for the Beyonder."
